sentences.en: Do not use Check Arm as a handle to unscrew.
sentences.cn: 不要用止回阀臂作为把手来旋转螺纹.

sentences.en: I can't unscrew the lid of this jar.
I can't unscrew the top of this bottle.
I had never before known that the human leg did unscrew.
sentences.cn: 我以前还真不知道这人腿是可以拧下来的.

sentences.en: She unscrewed the cap of her water bottle and gave him a drink.
sentences.cn: 她拧开水瓶的盖，给他水喝。

sentences.en: Slowly unscrew bleed screw on SVB ( about three turns ).
sentences.cn: 慢慢放松关闭阀B上 的排气螺丝 ( 大约三圈 ).

sentences.en: Step 4 : Unscrew the four cover screws.
sentences.cn: 步骤 四: 松开上盖的四颗螺丝.

sentences.en: To replace relief valve disc, hold the upper guide fin and unscrew the diaphragm pressure plate.
sentences.cn: 要更换安全阀阀瓣, 握住上部引导翼,旋下隔膜压力板上的螺丝.
旋下螺丝,拆卸阀帽组件.

sentences.en: Unscrew body halves using open end or adjustable wrench on flats provided.
sentences.cn: 采用预备好的平头上开口或可调节扳手拧下一半阀体上的螺丝.

sentences.en: Unscrew seat cylinder from body and remove entire assembly.
sentences.cn: 从阀体上拧下阀座圆筒上的螺丝,并拆卸整个总成.

sentences.en: Unscrew the bonnet by turning counterclockwise.
sentences.cn: 反时针方向旋转拧松阀盖.

sentences.en: Unscrew the jar and cover with lid fitted over it.
sentences.cn: 旋开罐盖,用合适的盖子覆盖.

sentences.en: Unscrew the locks from the doors!
Unscrew wood cap of bottle and remove plug.
Use to unscrew Flame Adjuster Nut & Pump's Stop Nut.
sentences.cn: 用来旋松火焰调节器螺帽 和 泵的限位螺帽.

trans.tran_en: to open something by twisting it
